# CSSearchQueryError.Code.cancelled

**Case**

The query stopped because someone canceled it.

## Declaration

```swift
case cancelled
```

## Discussion

The system reports this error if your code called the [doc://com.apple.corespotlight/documentation/CoreSpotlight/CSUserQuery/cancel()] method.

## Getting the error codes

- **CSSearchQueryError.Code.indexUnreachable**: The index is unreachable.
- **CSSearchQueryError.Code.invalidQuery**: The query is syntactically invalid or specifies items that your app doesn’t have access to.
- **CSSearchQueryError.Code.unknown**: An unknown error occurred.
